name: Walden, a game
description: Take on Henry David Thoreau’s classic adventure in living simply in nature as you explore this epic open world game based on the story of Thoreau’s life in the woods alone at Walden Pond.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2.4 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
